metadata.description: The name of new Azure VNet where you can deploy Azure Sql Managed Instances and the resources that use them
The name of default subnet for VNet (used to deploy VMs, web, and other client apps - no Managed Instances). You can delete this subnet later if you don't need it.
The name of the subnet dedicated to Azure SQL Managed Instances
IP Address range in the subnet dedicated to Azure SQL Managed Instances
The name of the existing or new route table that enables access to Azure SQL Managed Instance Management Service that controls the instance, manages backups and other maintenance operations
Name of network security group dedicated to managed instance subnet
Azure data center location where all resources will be deployed
